title: Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship 2021
content: 아래와 같이 Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship 2021을 안내드리오니 지원하시기 전에 첨부의 유의사항을 반드시 확인하시어주시기 바랍니다. For those who are interested in the Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship 2021, please check the attached instructions before applying. Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship 2021 has been launched recently. We cordially invite you to recommend your outstanding junior PhD students to apply for the program. The MSRA Fellowship Program aims to build the next generation of research leaders with a unique program offering a combination of scholarship, mentorship, research, networking and academic opportunities to promising young candidates. Moreover, Fellows and their advisors could enjoy long-term close engagement with Microsoft Research Asia, one of the leading computer science research labs in the world. Please visit the program homepage to learn more about it and read the feedbacks from previous recipients of the fellowship. The MSRA Fellowship program would accept direct applications from individual PhD students with their advisors’ strong recommendation. Below is some information about this MSRA Fellowship 2021 Provisions of the award Cash awards of ＄10,000 USD Guaranteed, but not required three-month internship at Microsoft Research Asia. Opportunity to attend Microsoft academic conferences in computer science in the Asia-Pacific region. At the discretion of Microsoft Research Asia, advisors of fellows might be invited to participate in collaborative research projects and academic exchange events. Eligibility criteria Applicants must attend a university in China Mainland, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Korea or Singapore, and do research work that relates to computing topics in which Microsoft Research is concerned with. According to the definition of the normative period of PhD program of the applicants’ university and region, the applicant must graduate in 2023 or later. The applicants and their advisors would be asked for supporting documents if needed. Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship Committee owns the final interpretation of above clauses. How to apply The 2021 Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship application period closes on June 30, 2021 PhD students must apply directly for the scholarship via online application tool Materials required: 1) Application form; 2) Curriculum vitae; 3) Research Statement; 4) At least two letters of reference. For more detailed requirements on “How to Apply”, and more information on Eligibility criteria, Award provisions, and Program timeline, please kindly visit 2021 MSRA Fellowship homepage: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/academic-program/fellowships-microsoft-research-asia/
